{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.02225v1", "title": "Twisted second moment of modular $L$-functions to a fixed modulus", "summary": "We study asymptotically the twisted second moment of the family of modular
$L$-functions to a fixed modulus. As an application, we establish sharp lower
bounds for all real $k \geq 0$ and sharp upper bounds for $k$ in the range $0
\leq k \leq 1$ for the $2k$-th moment of these $L$-functions on the critical
line.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-03T02:46:48Z"}
